Description: Job description: We are seeking an experienced and highly skilled Senior Machine Learning and Data Engineer with over 7+ years of experience. The ideal candidate will have proficiency in Generative AI (GenAI) and AI models, with a strong background in Python and Java. An understanding of REST API and other interface integrations will be a significant advantage.   Key Responsibilities: Design, develop, and deploy machine learning models and algorithms. Work extensively with Generative AI (GenAI) models to create innovative solutions. Develop and maintain scalable data pipelines and build out new API integrations to support continuing increases in data volume and complexity. Implement machine learning models, including data preprocessing, feature engineering, model training, and evaluation. Collaborate with data scientists, analysts, and other engineers to develop data-driven solutions. Optimize and improve existing machine learning models and algorithms for performance and scalability. Ensure the robustness and reliability of deployed models in production environments. Integrate various data sources and develop RESTful APIs for seamless data exchange. Keep up-to-date with the latest advancements in machine learning, AI, and data engineering technologies.   Preferred Qualifications: 7+ years of experience in machine learning, data engineering, or related fields. Proficiency in Python and Java programming languages. Strong experience with Generative AI (GenAI) and AI model development. Hands-on experience with machine learning frameworks and libraries such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, etc. Solid understanding of REST API design and development. Experience with data engineering tools and platforms such as Apache Kafka, Spark, Hadoop, etc. Knowledge of database systems (SQL/NoSQL) and data warehousing solutions. Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure) and containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes) is a plus. Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently and as part of a team. Strong communication skills to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams.
relevancy: This job posting is highly relevant because it explicitly mentions Generative AI, Machine Learning, Python, and Java, all of which are key skills listed in the user's profile. The job description also highlights experience with data engineering tools and cloud platforms, further aligning with the user's background and interests. The location is Bangalore, matching the user's preference.
